summary: Broadband Internet service is essential to many aspects of modern life, so it's important to make sure everyone has access. Yet tribal lands, especially in rural areas, are still underserved. In such areas, wireless broadband can help keep people connected. However, the Federal Communications Commission has done little to promote and support tribes' access to radio frequency spectrum that can be used for such wireless...
title: Tribal Broadband: FCC Should Undertake Efforts to Better Promote Tribal Access to Spectrum
